Pre-Game Insights: George Bailey confirmed Steve Smith won't be in Australia's playing 11 against New Zealand.
The team will rely on all-rounders like Mitch Marsh, Glenn Maxwell, and Marcus Stoinis.
Mitchell Marsh is likely to be the number three, and Tim David's emergence is noted.
David Warner is fine and wasn't played in the warm-up against India due to his neck injury.
Glenn Maxwell's form is a concern but crucial for the team's balance.
